article.headline: UAB 72, Centenary 58
article.story: BIRMINGHAM, Ala. (AP) -- Marvett McDonald scored 15 points and Brandon Tobias added 11, leading UAB to a 72-58 win over Centenary on Monday night. Wen Mukubu scored 10 points for UAB (5-3). Chris Watson scored 19 points and Clarke Jackson added 10 to lead Centenary (2-6). Guard Brian Baumann had a game-high 11 rebounds for the Gents. The Blazers led 38-20 at halftime and used a full-court pressure defense to force 37 turnovers for the game. UAB held Centenary scoreless for more than 7 minutes in the first half to jump to a 24-4 lead. The Blazers biggest margin was 25 points, when McDonald hit a 3-pointer to make it 34-9. UAB got off to a sluggish start in the second half, and a pair of 3s by Jackson helped Centenary cut the margin to 40-31. But Mukubu scored 5 points to spark a 12-0 run that put the game away for UAB. Paul Delaney had 7 points, eight rebounds and four assists for the Blazers. Carldell Johnson had six steals.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
